DOC.brief_title: To Compare Ability DiscoVisc® OVD Protect Corneal Endothelium Maintain Anterior Chamber Space With Healon® Amvisc® PLUS During Cataract Surgery .
DOC.criteria: Patients able understand sign document informed consent ; Patients age ≥49 year agerelated cataract formation ; Patients plan undergo surgical removal cataract phacoemulsification implantation posterior chamber intraocular lens ; Patients healthy eye exclude formation cataract . pseudoexfoliation syndrome glaucoma zonular compromise operative eye ; A congenital ocular anomaly ( e.g. , aniridia , congenital cataract ) operative eye ; Iris atrophy operative eye ; Glaucoma ( include pseudoexfoliation pigmentary ) cause compromised outflow operative eye ; Any abnormality prevents reliable Goldmann applanation tonometry operative eye ; Ocular hypertension ( lntraocular Pressure ( IOP ) > 21 mmHg ) operative eye baseline exam ; Corneal abnormality result poor endothelial cell photograph prevents reliable endothelial cell density measurement ; Baseline endothelial cell density < 1500 cells/mm2 , operative eye ; Planned multiple procedure cataract/Intraocular Lens ( IOL ) implantation surgery ( e.g. , trabeculoplasty , corneal transplant ) . NOTE : A minor relaxing keratotomy Patients 48 year age younger ; Proliferative diabetic retinopathy operative eye ; Uncontrolled diabetes mellitus ; Marfan 's Syndrome ; An ocular disease and/or condition may compromise result ; A history chronic recurrent inflammatory eye disease ( e.g . iritis , scleritis , uveitis , iridocyclitis , rubeosis iritis ) operative eye ; Lens correction astigmatism may perform ; Previous ocular trauma operative eye ( include previous intraocular surgery traumatic cataract ) .
